import React,{useState}from'react';import Navigation from'./components/Navigation';import Footer from'./components/Footer';import ExerciceRouter from'./components/ExerciceRouter';import HomePage from'./pages/HomePage';import CoursPage from'./pages/CoursPage';import DesignGraphiquePage from'./pages/DesignGraphiquePage';import UiUxDesignPage from'./pages/UiUxDesignPage';import TypographiePage from'./pages/TypographiePage';import CouleurPage from'./pages/CouleurPage';import ProjetsPage from'./pages/ProjetsPage';import RessourcesPage from'./pages/RessourcesPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SiteDesignGraphique=()=>{const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState('home');const[mobileMenuOpen,setMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);const[currentExercice,setCurrentExercice]=useState(null);// Si un exercice est sélectionné, afficher l'exercice
if(currentExercice){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExerciceRouter,{exerciceId:currentExercice,onClose:()=>setCurrentExercice(null)});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-slate-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{currentPage:currentPage,setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage,mobileMenuOpen:mobileMenuOpen,setMobileMenuOpen:setMobileMenuOpen}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-12",children:[currentPage==='home'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage}),currentPage==='cours'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CoursPage,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage}),currentPage==='design-graphique'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DesignGraphiquePage,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage}),currentPage==='ui-ux-design'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UiUxDesignPage,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage}),currentPage==='typo'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TypographiePage,{setCurrentExercice:setCurrentExercice,setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage}),currentPage==='couleur'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CouleurPage,{setCurrentExercice:setCurrentExercice}),currentPage==='projets'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjetsPage,{setCurrentExercice:setCurrentExercice}),currentPage==='ressources'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RessourcesPage,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default SiteDesignGraphique;
